amendment.description: Amendment limits the interest to be credited to Transportation Trust Funds to the average interest rate on fifty-two week Treasury securities sold to the public.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to impose a limitation on interest paid to trust funds which is determined to be the average interest rate on 52-week Treasury securities sold to the public during such fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
